articles.content: From my time with its early hours, Soul Hackers 2 feels like the logical accumulation of the many lessons that Atlus learned with its recent SMT-related games. The majority of the game still consists… [+3232 chars]

articles.title: MultiVersus season 1 release date delayed, says WB Games - Polygon
articles.description: The open beta for MultiVersus, which began July 26, will continue for PlayStation, PC, and Xbox, while season 1 content, including Rick and Morty, are delayed “to a later date.”
articles.content: MultiVersus, the Warner Bros. ensemble fighting game whose free, open beta began last week, will have its first season of content delayed to an unspecified later date, the games official Twitter acco… [+1163 chars]
